typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as long,
		sector_id as long,
		n_bins as integer,
		kilos as integer,
		market as string,
		truck_plate as string,
		created_at as timestamp,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		date as date,
		variety_id as long,
		internal_guide as integer,
		buyer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		id as long,
		sector_id as long,
		n_bins as integer,
		kilos as integer,
		market as string,
		truck_plate as string,
		created_at as timestamp,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		date as date,
		variety_id as long,
		internal_guide as integer,
		buyer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 select(mapColumn(
		sector_id,
		n_bins,
		kilos,
		market,
		truck_plate,
		date,
		variety_id,
		internal_guide,
		buyer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Seleccionar1
Existe1 derive(idFecha = year(date)*10000+month(date)*100+dayOfMonth(date)) ~> Columnaderivada1
Columnaderivada1 alterRow() ~> Modificarfila1
Seleccionar1, source2 exists(Seleccionar1@sector_id == source2@sector_id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Existe1
Modificarfila1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
